channel.title: Orks on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Orks on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Warhammer illustration
item.description: In this work I was inspired by the book “Brutal Kunnin” by Mike Brooks #warhammer40k #warhammer #warhammerart #warhammercommunity #wh40k #40k #brushray #artbrushray #orks #adeptusmechanicus #mechanicus Like my work? Feel free to contact me ✉ for your personalized piece of art anytime!

item.title: Gul’dan – an orc warlock
item.description: Hi everyone! I want to show you my new Warcraft fan art and to tell a small story behind it. My love to computer games started with Starcraft. Later then when I discovered digital art, Starcraft and Warcraft were among the major sources of inspiration Needless to say I raved about the idea of making art for the Blizzard… many did. But man, how good one have to be to work with them.
